meanings.definition: A group of metallic elements in the periodic table, typically found in rare earth minerals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of the lanthanon group.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a new deposit of lanthanon in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The lanthanon elements decided to throw a party in the periodic table.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between lanthanon elements.
meanings.sent5: The rare earth minerals shimmered with the beauty of lanthanon.

meanings.definition: Any element belonging to the lanthanon series.
meanings.sent1: The student identified the lanthanon element in the series.
meanings.sent2: Lanthanon elements have unique properties that set them apart.
meanings.sent3: The lanthanon series went on a quest to find their missing element.
meanings.sent4: In the story of elements, lanthanon played a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The periodic table sparkled with the presence of lanthanon.
